title: Hell of a Night
overview: Behind the slums and dark alleys of Kuala Lumpur, Sam cheats and poses as a shaman to survive. His victims are those who are easily fooled by black magic and by taking advantage of them, Sam makes money from them with cheap deception and illusions.Sam also has a sixth sense and can see supernatural beings, but he rejects this belief because for him it is a curse. Dina, Sam's ex-lover, comes to ask for help in finding her missing sister after hearing supernatural voices, Sam tries to help Dina.The loss of Alia is just the beginning of a bigger threat, involving a group of heretics from the elite led by a mysterious and charismatic man named Gusti. Together with Dina and Suria, Sam will be suspected of unexpected events while the city of Kuala Lumpur witnesses Gusti's grand plan in action.
